definition: to glue something lightly enough that it can be removed later
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip

sentences.english: Slightly paste the tapes onto outer boundary of the scroll.
sentences.chinese: 將邊緣的紙條浮貼於紙卷外側。
